# 1.) crickets
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

crickets = read.table("Data/Crickets.txt",header=T)
str(crickets)

fit<-lm(chirps~temp,data=crickets)
predict(fit,newdata=data.frame(temp=78),interval="predict",level=0.95)
#
predict(fit,newdata=data.frame(temp=68),interval="predict")
#
summary(fit)

crickets$residuals <- resid(fit)
crickets$fitted <- fitted(fit)

ggplot(crickets,aes(x=fitted,y=residuals))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_abline(aes(intercept = 0,slope=0))+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(crickets,aes(sample=residuals))+
  stat_qq()+
  stat_qq_line()+
  theme_classic()

```
